name: Jelly Monsters
overview: A faithful clone of Namco's arcade hit Pac-Man for the VIC-20 developed by HAL Laboratory and published by Commodore Business Machines in North America and the UK, as well as Handic Software in Sweden. The game however didn't last as it was pulled from the shelves due to a lawsuit from Atari, and was replaced by a lesser clone called Cosmic Cruncher.
